      • findVeggiesInRange

        public java.util.ArrayList findVeggiesInRange(Salads salad,
                                              double minCal,
                                              double maxCal)
        Find all vegetables in the salad within given range
        Parameters:
        salad - salad recipe to seek for the vegetables
        minCal - minimal amount of calories
        maxCal - maximal amount of calories
        Returns:
        ArrayList with all vegetables from the recipe which fit given range
